items.preText: India need 26 off 30. Bangladesh desperately need wickets. Here's Rubel.
items.text: full just outside off, and Bhuvi swings across the line after clearing his front leg. But mistimes the shot down to mid on
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Kumar, no run

items.text: short on off stump, and Bhuvi chooses to let this ball go. Looks at the square-leg umpire, who says it's not a wide
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Kumar, no run

items.text: crunched! Full on off, and Bhuvi clears his front leg and check-drives right over Rubel's head! Soars over the long-off boundary as the crowd erupts in delight
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Kumar, SIX runs

items.preText: The India flags are out once again.
items.text: full on middle but going down leg. Hits his front leg, but they manage to pinch a run anyway
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Kumar, 1 leg bye

items.preText: Venky: "Supposed to be out on a romantic holiday with the missus at Lake Como.. but can't stop checking cricinfo.. lady not looking too happy. Come on India, finish the game soon.. "
items.text: back of a length on middle stump, and Jadeja rides the bounce to defend off the back foot
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Jadeja, no run

items.text: full on middle, and driven to mid off for a quick single. Jadeja's got to hurry, but he makes it across easily. The fielder's throw was nowhere near the non-striker's stumps
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Jadeja, 1 run

items.preText: India need 18 off four overs. Fizz time. Crunch time.
items.text: back of a length outside off, and he tries to steer a late cut to third man. Finds the fielder poaching at backward point. India need 18 off 23 now
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jadeja, no run

items.text: good length outside off, and the square cut finds backward point once again! Carbon copy of the last shot. 18 off 22 now
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jadeja, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off. Angling into Jadeja, and he steers this perfectly to third man for a walking single
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jadeja, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on middle, and fended off the back foot. Bhuvi wants to take a single, but Jadeja screams 'no'
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Kumar, no run

items.text: good length just outside off. Defended off the back foot to cover on this occasion
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Kumar, no run

items.text: clipped! And it runs away for a boundary. India have the advantage once more. Full on leg stump, and Bhuvi closes his bat's face and tickles a shot to the fine-leg boundary!
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Kumar, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length on off, and he punches to short mid off for a quick run. The fielder tries to run Jadeja out at the bowler's end, and he misses. Nobody's backing up, so India pinch a second run as well. Oh dear
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Jadeja, 2 runs

items.text: tickled! But the umpire doesn't raise his finger. Bangladesh are reviewing. It was a length ball angling across Jadeja. He tried to drive away from his body, and there was a faint noise as the ball went past him. UltraEdge says 'out' and Bangladesh get a last-gasp hope
items.postText: Bipin Wanchoo: "Not one batsman has scored a half century in this innings!!!! What's the highest chase ever made without any batsman scoring a half century?"  -- England's 262 v Zimbabwe in 2001. http://www.espncricinfo.com/series/15463/scorecard/64730/zimbabwe-vs-england-3rd-odi-england-tour-of-zimbabwe-2001-02
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Jadeja, OUT

dismissal.text: RA Jadeja c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Rubel Hossain 23 (33b 1x4 0x6) SR: 69.69

items.preText: Kedar Jadhav is back. Bangladesh need dot balls. Or wickets. Or both.
items.text: back of a length just outside off, and flicked away to the vacant square-leg region for a single. Jadhav hobbles across for one
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Jadhav, 1 run

items.text: slower ball, full outside off. Worked away to the leg side, but straight to midwicket
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Kumar, no run

items.text: back of a length just outside off. Tries to steer this to third man, but it's too close to his body. Played to point
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Kumar, no run

items.text: good length on middle, and he uncomfortably punches down the ground. Bhuvi will keep strike. India need 9 off 12.
items.postText: Asad: "Someone said Vkohli is not missed"
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Kumar, 1 run

items.preText: Final moments of the Asia Cup, you reckon. India will like to maximise this over. Here's Fizz to bowl out.
items.text: taken by the keeper! Angling away from Bhuvi and he looks to drive away from his body. The keeper dives to his right and takes an excellent diving catch! Twist in the tail?
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Kumar, OUT

dismissal.text: B Kumar c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Mustafizur Rahman 21 (31b 1x4 1x6) SR: 67.74

items.preText: Kuldeep on strike. India need 9 off 11.
items.text: full just outside off, and he defends towards cover. But the ball takes a leading edge towards the leg side instead. India won't mind how they come
items.postText:
Rahul: "Who will be MoM? Jadhav or someone else (Liton)?" -- Liton's my man

Sai: "This is going like the Women's world cup Final."
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Kuldeep Yadav, 1 run

items.preText: Jadhav on strike. Just how India would've wanted it.
items.text: full just outside off, and the push goes straight to backward point. Says no to the single. India need 8 off 9 now.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jadhav, no run

items.text: good length just outside off. Angling across Jadhav, and he taps this away to point. Can't find the single
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jadhav, no run

items.text: back of a length on middle. Jadhav fends off the back foot, and the ball hits his glove. Kuldeep wants the run, but Jadhav says no.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jadhav, no run

items.text: length ball on off, and that's been cut away to deep point for a couple more. India need six but Kuldeep will be on strike
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jadhav, 2 runs

items.preText: Final over. What a terrific tournament this has been. I just can't stop repeating myself. Looks like it's Soumya Sarkar! Can he bury the ghosts of the Nidahas Trophy loss? Remember, it was DK who smacked him for a final-ball six in that game. Here's Kuldeep to face him. Oh wait. Mashrafe has changed his mind at the last moment. It's going to be Mahmudullah. It's all happenin'! Nerves all around. Wonder if the choice was because Kuldeep's the left-hander. Man, this is tense. Around the wicket to the batsman.
items.text: full just outside off, and caressed down the ground to wide long off. Gets Jadhav back on strike
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Kuldeep Yadav, 1 run
